Reviews.Title: Samsung c417
Reviews.Author: sherrym306
Reviews.Content: The only problem with my order is that the phone was avertised as being new and it wasn't, it looks like it is probably a refurbished one. I can not charge the battery in the phone I have to charge it in my husbands old one. This style of phone is the only one my husband has ever had and he knows how to work it well. I did not know how to contact any one to send it back, for exchange so since it works we just deal with it.

Reviews.Title: It shipped broken
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This item never powered up.  I thought it would be good for my trip to Europe.  I just bought the min from ATT for my real phone and I was fine.

Reviews.Title: samsung c417 phone
Reviews.Author: phil
Reviews.Content: the phone is great but there is no instructions with it. it is easy too use it has a lot of good features.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung C417 Unlocked GSM Flip Phone
